chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: Mistress of Novices, p. 21 (14)—The Aes Sedai who is in charge of training novices in the White Tower. The post was held by Sheriam Bayanar until a coup that deposed Siuan Sanche chased her out of the Tower. The post is now held by Silviana Brehon in Tar Valon and Tiana Noselle in Salidar. See also Bayanar, Sheriam; Noselle, Tiana.
